New Records: Yuzvendra Chahal goes past Jasprit Bumrah to become India's leading wicket-taker in T20Is
Key Match Events: India beat Sri Lanka by 62 runs in the first T20I at the Ekana Sports City in Lucknow
Others: Bhuvneshwar Kumar and Venkatesh Iyer have taken two wickets each
Ishan Kishan and Shreyas Iyer smashed fifties as India managed to post a mammoth total of 199 for two against Sri Lanka
Chahal also went past Jasprit Bumrah to become India's leading wicket-taker in T20Is
